org.hps.readout.ecal.updated

Class EcalRawConverterReadoutDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ReadoutDriver
        • org.hps.readout.RawConverterReadoutDriver
          • org.hps.readout.ecal.updated.EcalRawConverterReadoutDriver

  • public class EcalRawConverterReadoutDriver
extends RawConverterReadoutDriver
    EcalRawConverterReadoutDriver is an implementation of RawConverterReadoutDriver for the calorimeter subdetector.
    See Also:
    RawConverterReadoutDriver

    • Field Detail

      • converter

        private EcalReadoutMode3RawConverter converter
        The converter object responsible for processing raw hits into proper CalorimeterHit objects.

      • ecalConditions

        private EcalConditions ecalConditions
        Cached copy of the calorimeter conditions. All calorimeter conditions should be called from here, rather than by directly accessing the database manager.

    • Method Detail

      • setDaqConfigurationAppliedintoReadout

        public void setDaqConfigurationAppliedintoReadout(boolean state)
        Sets whether or not the DAQ configuration is applied into the driver the EvIO data stream or whether to read the configuration from data files.
        Parameters:
        state - - true indicates that the DAQ configuration is applied into the readout system, and false that it is not applied into the readout system.

      • setSkipBadChannels

        public void setSkipBadChannels(boolean state)
        Indicates whether or not data from channels flagged as "bad" in the conditions system should be ignored. true indicates that they should be ignored, and false that they should not.
        Overrides:
        setSkipBadChannels in class RawConverterReadoutDriver
        Parameters:
        apply - - true indicates that "bad" channels will be ignored and false that they will not.

        Description copied from class: RawConverterReadoutDriver
        Gets the ReadoutRawConverter object used to convert hits for this subdetector.
        Specified by:
        getConverter in class RawConverterReadoutDriver
        Returns:

      • isBadChannel

        protected boolean isBadChannel(long channelID)
        Description copied from class: RawConverterReadoutDriver
        Indicates whether or not the channel on which a hit occurs is a "bad" channel according to the conditions database.
        Overrides:
        isBadChannel in class RawConverterReadoutDriver
        Returns:

      • findChannel

        private EcalChannelConstants findChannel(long cellID)
        Gets the channel parameters for a given channel ID.
        Parameters:
        cellID - - The long ID value that represents the channel. This is typically acquired from the method getCellID() in a CalorimeterHit object.
        Returns:
        Returns the channel parameters for the channel as an EcalChannelConstants object.
